p: BLAST searches in GenBank and the P. trichocarpa genome v3.0 [ 90] databases ( http://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/BLAST; http://www.phytozome.net) was used to identify genes, and ClustalW (http:// www.ebi.ac.uk/Tools/msa/clustalw2) to perform multiple sequence alignments. Gene- specific primer sequences for the qPCR analysis were designed with Primer3 ( http://frodo.wi.mit.edu/primer3).
